welcome_description: We value your privacy, that’s why we want you to know how we use your information.
consent_data_analytics: I consent to the collection of personal data for support & analytics purposes.
consent_data_advertising: I agree to play for free and consent to the collection of personal data for advertising purposes.
pp_tos_acceptance: I agree to the <link="http://homagames.com/privacy/"><u>Privacy Policy</u></link> and <link="http://homagames.com/terms"><u>Terms of Homa Games</u></link>  and their partners, and I confirm that I am older than 16 years old, or that I have my guardians’ permission.
analytics_and_support_description: We use this to understand how you play the game and detect bugs to improve the game experience.
tailored_ads_description: We use information about your interests to serve you ads that are relevant to you.
change_preferences_any_time: You can change your preferences at any time in the game settings.
prepopup_text:
This game is free because it's funded by adverts.

Allowing tracking on the next screen helps keep it this way.
prepopup_text_no_gdpr:
This game is free thanks to advertisements.

Allowing tracking on the next screen helps us:
prepopup_text_no_gdpr_bullet_one: Show ads that match your interests, for example similar games than <game_name>
prepopup_text_no_gdpr_bullet_two: Personalize and improve your experience over time
paywall_title: Want to play <game_name> with no ads ?
paywall_pay_text: Enjoy this game with no ads !
paywall_tailored_ads: Play for free with tailored ads
paywall_tailored_ads_secondary: Simply allow tracking to play for free
tracking_banner_title: Support us and help the game stay free !
tracking_banner_text: Simply allow tracking to receive tailored ads.
tracking_banner_cta: Allow tracking to keep the game free
